Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Behave tests in test/regression/daily folder are not available to integrate in community CI. Once the in-review gerrit patch sets are merged will enable these tests in CI.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Behave tests are integrated in CI now.. https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/Daily/job/fabric-daily-tests-x86_64/test_results_analyzer/
